testcase.name: Select and Edit some reagent item
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website..........................................passed Then user is navigated to "login" page......................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "admin".........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then user is navigated to "Dashboard" page..................................passed When user clicks on menu "Reagent"..........................................passed And user clicks on sub-menu "Library".......................................passed Then user is navigated to "Reagent Library" page............................passed And "Reagent" items is already exist........................................passed When user select an "reagent" item "Reagent 44" by check the checkbox.......passed Then "reagent" checkbox "Reagent 44" item is checked........................passed When user select an "reagent" item "Reagent 11" by check the checkbox.......passed Then "reagent" checkbox "Reagent 11" item is checked........................passed And button "edit" "reagent" is enabled......................................passed When user clicks on "edit reagent" button...................................passed Then user is navigated to "Edit Reagent" page...............................passed When user change "name" with "Reagent 4.0"..................................passed And user change "note" with "Reagent 4.0 with Antibiotic"...................passed And user clicks on "save reagent" button....................................passed Then modal "save" confirmation is displayed.................................passed When user clicks on "Ok" button.............................................passed Then the "reagent" item is "updated" with notification "Success" and "Reagent has been updated".passed When user clicks on "arrow Next" button.....................................passed Then user is navigated to "Edit Reagent" page...............................passed When user change "name" with "Reagent 1.0"..................................passed And user change "note" with "Reagent 1.0 with Antibiotic"...................passed And user clicks on "save reagent" button....................................passed Then modal "save" confirmation is displayed.................................passed When user clicks on "Ok" button.............................................passed Then the "reagent" item is "updated" with notification "Success" and "Reagent has been updated".passed When user clicks on "close" button..........................................passed And user is navigated to "Reagent Library" page.............................passed
